outdir.name: output directory
outdir.description: Output directory for storing output files

background.name: background run
background.description: Run appion in background mode; no extra features that slow things down

limit.name: image processing limit
limit.description: Limit the number of images to process

nowait.name: do not wait for more images
nowait.description: Do not wait for more images after finishing all images

norejects.name: skip rejects
norejects.description: Skip images that have been assessed as rejects

shuffle.name: shuffle images
shuffle.description: Shuffle the order of the images; do not process them in order

nocontinue.name: do not continue
nocontinue.description: Overrides 'continue'; removes donedict and starts from beginning

tiltangle.name: tilt angle
tiltangle.description: Only box particles from images within 1 degree of this tilt angle
